LanguageData.Gun_Phalanx.label: A-1 Phalanx
LanguageData.Gun_Phalanx.description: A close-in weapon to be used with no loss of stopping power in comparison with a soldier's assault rifle. The Phalanx enjoys a ballistics advantage over most heavy pistols. Civilian variants are often purchased by colonists on planets that have particularly dangerous big-game animals.
LanguageData.Gun_Phalanx.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Phalanx.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Phalanx.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_BlackWidow.label: A-1BW Black Widow
LanguageData.Gun_BlackWidow.description: Accurate and deadly blaster. Effective against armor, shields, and biotic barriers.
LanguageData.Gun_BlackWidow.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_BlackWidow.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_BlackWidow.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_Harrier.label: A-6 Cerberus Harrier
LanguageData.Gun_Harrier.description: These Cerberus blaster are fully automatic. Cerberus gunsmiths reined in the recoil issues, resulting in a gun that stays on target but delivers slightly less punch per round than a standard Mattock. As such, the weapon is typically utilized by Cerberus’s elite troopers who train constantly to make every burst count.
LanguageData.Gun_Harrier.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Harrier.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Harrier.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_Predator.label: A-2S Predator
LanguageData.Gun_Predator.description: Very rare blaster shotgun. Deals high damage at short range; less effective at long range. Effective against armor, shields and biotic barriers. It is of human design but is only used by krogan, due to the fact that the kickback from a single shot has enough force to break a human's arm. Protected by Fabrication Rights Management (FRM) technology, this weapon is nearly impossible to reproduce and is prohibitively expensive.
LanguageData.Gun_Predator.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Predator.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Predator.tools.2.label: muzzle

LanguageData.Gun_Hurricane.description: Very rare blaster shotgun. Deals high damage at short range; less effective at long range. Effective against armor, shields and biotic barriers. It is of human design but is only used by krogan, due to the fact that the kickback from a single shot has enough force to break a human's arm. Protected by Fabrication Rights Management (FRM) technology, this weapon is nearly impossible to reproduce and is prohibitively expensive.
LanguageData.Gun_Hurricane.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Hurricane.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Hurricane.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_AvengerA.label: A-10 Avenger
LanguageData.Gun_AvengerA.description: A common, versatile, military-grade assault blaster. Accurate when fired in short bursts, and deadly when fired on full auto.
LanguageData.Gun_AvengerA.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AvengerA.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AvengerA.tools.2.label: muzzle
